snippet: Called administrative in nature, the investigation was seeking to verify that properly licensed personnel were the only ones distributing the medications to players.
abstract: Drug Enforcement Administration agents question medical-staff members from San Francisco 49ers and several other teams as part of continuing investigation into distribution of painkillers in the NFL.
lead_paragraph: Called administrative in nature, the investigation was seeking to verify that properly licensed personnel were the only ones distributing the medications to players.

headline.main: Federal Investigation Into Painkillers Targets N.F.L. Teams’ Medical Staffs
headline.print_headline: U.S. Questions N.F.L. Teams’ Medical Staffs on Painkillers
